item.title: Sources
item.description: In what follows, you can find the main resources that were used while building the database, and the rationale behind the selections. 1. A Master List of Spices The first step was to create a list of spices that are relatively well-known, using information gathered by professionals from various fields. The second step was to collate the data on these materials, and morph it into a unified database to faciliate further enquiries.
